name: MOVA
0:
”Alexa, turn on the vacuum”
”Alexa, turn off the vacuum”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill requires Mi Home account, download Mi Home App and register yourself if you didn't have an account yet, enable skill in Alexa, then you can talk with Alexa to control your MOVA vacumm. 
Supported devices: MOVA vacuum.
Supported actions: turn on, turn off.
